channel.title: Halo fucking reach?
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E95PeZ0qsLY http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-9VRl0hgqbQ
Holy fucking shit. I can't stop swearing because I'm so excited for this game.
Watch the videos shit brix post a comment ?????????????

item.title: Halo fucking reach?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:45, topic:331743”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=428122.msg3145712#msg3145712 date=1268020593]

[quote author=Frell link=topic=428122.msg3145704#msg3145704 date=1268020228]

[shadow=red,left][size=18pt]multiplayer demo MAY 3rd :D[/size][/shadow]

[/quote]If you bought the gay ODST disc…

I have it but i didnt get the beta key or whatever
[/quote]I have nothing against the game itself, but the fact that you have to pay $20 or so for new maps is gay as fuck.

Nvm found the code thing.

And you get all map packs, the full halo multiplayer and you get a neat campaign.[/quote]
Yeah, ODST campaign was interesting. Pays off too, the only good part of Halo 3 was multiplayer + forge + custom games, which are all included in ODST + halo reach beta?

Read full topic

OMFG! A new Halo 3 with a new name! I’m so fucking excited!
[/quote]
You’re an idiot, watch the fucking videos.[/quote]Bungie even said in the video that they totally gutted the framework and engine. It’s completely different from any other Halo within the series. They’re dynamics have multiplied tenfold, there’s so much more possible with the new framework.

item.title: Halo fucking reach?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:31, topic:331743”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=428122.msg3145092#msg3145092 date=1267982006]

Can’t wait, games are finally pushing the PS3 and Xbox to their limits, which is why the new XBox is coming out in 2011

Is that the xbox navel or someshit?

I swear to god every console is now going to be dancing in front of a camera.
[/quote]It’s natal, and it’s not dancing. If you watch the demo, there’s complete interaction with you and your character. It’s pretty legit imo, but I just hope they don’t implement every fucking game with that shit. I want to control my characters with ease and a bag of potato chips, natal will not supply that service…

Layed back on the couch is the only way I want to play my games.[/quote]
Yeah. I swear to god I’m not even gonna play consoles if they’re gonna be like that. Character control or not, it’s fucking retarded. I’m lazy and I intend to stay lazy

Read full topic

ps4 - Motion censored with camera
xbox 720 - Motion censored with camera
wii 2 - who fucking cares[/quote]
